name: Groklabs-website
body:
### Grok
/ɡräk/
verb *informal*
understand (something) intuitively or by empathy.
"because of all the commercials, children grok things immediately"
   * empathize or communicate sympathetically; establish a rapport.

### Welcome to Grok Labs.
We are an Ideation and Innovation consultancy based in San Francisco. The [Founder](https://github.com/boscomonkey/) was a 2014 [Presidential Innovation Fellow](https://presidentialinnovationfellows.gov/) at the Department of Energy's [SunShot Initiative](http://energy.gov/sunshot).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
